actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to extend to all unmarried individuals the full tax benefits of income splitting now enjoyed by married individuals filing joint returns.

summary.text: Income Splitting Tax Act- Extends to all unmarried individuals the full tax benefits of income splitting now enjoyed by married individuals filing joint returns. Provides that every individual shall make a declaration of his estimated tax if his gross income can be expected to exceed $10,000 (now $5,000) in the case of an individual subject to the tax imposed for the splitting of such income. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 1; 2; and 6015(a)(1))

titles.title: A bill to extend to all unmarried individuals the full tax benefits of income splitting now enjoyed by married individuals filing joint returns.
